data.content:
Từ điển Anh - Việt
◘[ka:t ; kæt]
*danh từ
 ■lá nhai dùng như chất ma túy

Anh - Anh
khat
[kα:t]
■ noun
1》 the leaves of an Arabian shrub, which are chewed (or drunk as an infusion) as a stimulant.
2》 the shrub that produces these leaves. [Catha edulis.]
Origin
C19: from Arab. ḳāt.

sentences.en: Bui Duc Thiem, Deputy Head of Office No 5 of the Ministry of Public Security’s Drug Crime Investigation Department, said some kinds of drugs, like American grass and khat (Catha edulis) leaves are being used in Viet Nam, but it was very difficult for police to crackdown on this crime because they were not in the list managed by the Government.
sentences.vi: Theo ông Bùi Đức Thiêm, Phó Cục trưởng Cục Điều tra tội phạm ma túy của Bộ Công an, một số loại thuốc như cỏ Mỹ và lá khat (Catha edulis) đang được sử dụng ở Việt Nam nhưng rất khó để công an thẳng tay trừng trị tội này vì chúng không có trong danh sách do Chính phủ quản lý.

sentences.en: Bui Duc Thiem, Deputy Head of Office No 5 of the Ministry of Public Security’s Drug Crime Investigation Department, said some kinds of drugs, like American grass and khat (Catha edulis) leaves are being used in Viet Nam, but it was very difficult for police to crackdown on this crime because they were not in the list managed by the Government.
